text: int main ( ) { int n , i , j , t , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , largest , m = 0 , sum = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } m = 0 ; largest = a [ n - 1 ] [ 0 ] ; for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { if ( largest < a [ n - 1 ] [ j ] ) { largest = a [ n - 1 ] [ j ] ; m ++ ; } } sum = largest ; for ( i = n - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { if ( m == 0 ) { sum = sum + a [ i ] [ 0 ] ; } else if ( m == n - 1 ) { sum = sum + a [ i ] [ ( m - 1 ) ] ; m -- ; } else if ( m != 0 || m != n - 1 ) { if ( a [ i ] [ m ] > a [ i ] [ m - 1 ] ) { sum = sum + a [ i ] [ m ] ; } else { sum = sum + a [ i ] [ m - 1 ] ; m -- ; } } } printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
